item.title: Mentioned by Fort Saskatchewan Record
item.description:
MP advises Fort's Multicultural Association
Member of parliament Tim Uppal stopped by the Fort last week to check in on, and offer advice to, the multi-cultural association. The association, which was formed one-year ago, showed off the work they have done to their MP and sought advice on how to ...

item.title: Mentioned by Fort Saskatchewan Record
item.description:
Fort MP gets new appointment
Edmonton-Sherwood Park MP Tim Uppal, whose constituency extends through Fort Saskatchewan, saw his post as Minister of State — Democratic Reform come to an end on July 15. As part of Prime Minister Stephen Harper's cabinet shuffle, Uppal is now ...

item.title: Mentioned by Sherwood Park News
item.description:
Uppal shuffled to new post
Thursday, July 18, 2013 2:57:19 MDT PM. Edmonton-Sherwood Park MP Tim Uppal has been moved from his post as the minister of State - Democratic Reform to the role of minister of Multiculturalism in the latest cabinet shuffle. (Chris Roussakis/QMI Agency ...

item.title: Mentioned by Fort Saskatchewan Record
item.description:
MP votes against veteran burial fund
Pictured helping to declare Highway 21 through the Fort as Veterans Way, Edmonton-Sherwood Park MP Tim Uppal (left), whose constituency extends through Fort Saskatchewan, voted against a motion to change criteria for The Last Post Fund. The fund ...

item.title: Mentioned by Edmonton Journal
item.description:
Tories shelve election reform act after Conservative MPs complain
The minister for democratic reform, Tim Uppal, was scheduled to table the legislation on Thursday. Officials had even planned an early morning technical briefing on the bill for reporters. But at the weekly ... In the House of Commons after Question Period, Ottawa Vanier Liberal MP Mauril Bélanger and NDP MP Craig Scott rose in the House to ask the Speaker to investigate whether a breach of privilege took place. Conservative House Leader Peter Van Loan replied that the Conservative caucus did not get an ...
